extension.description: The FunkStation presents you with a mix of Funk, Soul & Disco 24/7 - 365 days a year. Join us through the Shoutbox on the site or play your favourite song within 15 minutes by using the Song Requester.Please like us on Facebook ( The-Funkstation ) so that we can continue this stream.
